snippet: A group representing MF Global customers is trying to prove that the firm delayed returning its money, using checks rather than wire transfers, in an attempt to stay afloat.
abstract: A group representing MF Global customers is trying to prove that the firm delayed returning its money, using checks rather than wire transfers, in an attempt to stay afloat.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: Clients Raise Questions About MF Global Checks
headline.print_headline: Clients Raise Questions About MF Global Checks
